text:
bRuhaqspati#r.hEtIqnAM pra#tidhaqrtA tri#Navatrayastriq(gm)qSau tvAq stOmau# pRuthiqvyA(gg) Sra#yatAM ~MvaiSvadEvAgnimAruqtE uqkthE avya#thayantI staBnItA(gm) SAkvararaivaqtE sAma#nIq prati#ShThityA aqntari#kShAqyar.Sha#yastvA prathamaqjA dEqvEShu# diqvO mAtra#yA variqNA pra#thantu vidhaqrtA cAqyamadhi#patiScaq 
tE tvAq sarvE# saM~MvidAqnA nAka#sya pRuqShThE su#vaqrgE lOqkE yaja#mAnaM ca sAdayantu || 6 
(praqtIcIq di~g - maqruta#stE dEqvA adhi#pataya - ScatvAriq(gm)qSacca#) (A2)
